name: Ars Electronica Linz GmbH & Co KG
goal: Gegenstand des Unternehmens ist der Betrieb der Ars Electronica Linz GmbH & Co KG im Spannungsfeld von Kunst, Technologie und Gesellschaft und als Knoten im österreichischen und internationalen Netz von Wirtschaft, Wissenschaft, Kunst und Bildung.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Kunst, Kultur, Wissenschaft, Technologie, Gesellschaft, Bildung, Daten- Schutz, Künstliche Intelligenz

Ars Electronica is mainly engaged in European collaboration projects in the field of culture, research, innovation and eduaction (Creative Europe, H2020, Erasmus+,...) and is currently operativing the following EU funded projects:

Project Id Acronym
552461 European Digital Art and Science Network

559590 EUROPEAN NETWORK FOR CONTEMPORARY AUDIOVISUAL CREATION

665825 SPARKS

732019 STARTS Prize

821832 spaceEU

30-CE-0747724/00-66 STARTS Prize 2016
824950 STARTS Ecosystem

400597724 European ARTificial Intelligence Lab

2017-2021 European Media Art Platform

In the framework of these projects, Ars Electronica corresponds regularly with representatives from the European Commission and European Parliament (eg. for invitations to events, white papers, meetings,...).
